title: WBPDCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 61 Staff Nurse and Other Posts
description: The West Bengal Development Corporation Limited (WBPDCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 61 Medical Officer, Security Officer, Staff Nurse, and Assistant Sub Inspector Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, GNM, B.Sc Nursing, 12th, and Any Degree can apply for the WBPDCL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in on...
